description:
A code editor called BeagleEditor


BeagleEditor 2024.4.0.1
This update only includes bugfixes and does not contains any new features and from now, I upload Inno Setup script, too.
Open-source forever!Fixes
Fixed a bug that app crashes when saving a filePull requests made before releases
- Added winget releaser PR workflow with new version by @vikingnope in #2
- Revert "Added winget releaser PR workflow with new version" by @ManiArasteh in #3
- Re-added winget releaser by @vikingnope in #4
New Contributors
- @vikingnope made their first contribution in #2
Full Changelog: https://github.com/beaglesoftware/editor/compare/v2024.4...v2024.4.0.1
